oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tamme (XII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tamme describes what wild animals are eaten by the !kun. 1) p.9772v: !nanni and |uma provide some vocabulary, 2) See also Things eaten by the !kun and Food eaten by the !kun and What !nanni's father told him (what to eat and avoid), 3) This story is found in Book XI & XII-10.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Animals eaten by the !kun
